headline: The Bull Case For Autodesk (ADSK) Could Change Following Raised Guidance And Buybacks Amid Cloud-AI Push
summary: Autodesk, Inc. recently reported third-quarter 2025 results showing revenue of US$1,853 million and net income of US$343 million, alongside updated guidance calling for full-year revenue of about US$7.15 billion to US$7.17 billion and GAAP EPS of US$5.16 to US$5.33. At the same time, Autodesk completed a multi-year buyback program totaling about US$2.19 billion and plans to showcase its cloud and AI ambitions at the UBS Global Technology and AI Conference 2025, highlighting how capital...
